reviewText: The 10-Film Midnight Horror Collection: Zombies features 10 Zombie movies for your viewing pleasure. They are: Night of the Living Dead, Hide and Creep, White Zombie, Last of the Living, Teenage Zombies, King of the Zombies, Grave Mistake, I Am Omega, Awaken the Dead and Zombie Dearest(though not necessarily in that order).Let me get this out of the way, first, all the movies here are low-budget zombie movies or older zombie movies from the 30s, to the 50s. Make no mistake, however, every Zombie movie is very entertaining and worth owning. Course, you're probably going to read reviews here from others stating otherwise. Personally, I enjoyed this collection of movies. Everything from the comedy of Hide and Creep, Zombie Dearest & Last of the Living to the more serious movies like Night of the Living Dead, Grave Mistake & I Am Omega..this collection has a little bit of it all. My favorites, overall, were: Night of the Living Dead(of course), Zombie Dearest, Hide and Creep and I Am Omega.This is a worthwhile purchase for its' asking price. I highly recommend it to everyone!
Title: N/A

reviewText: While I'm not big on zombies, myself, some folks are.... The person I gave this gift to is one of them. He said he enjoyed them and that they added to his collection, even though there were a couple of overlaps. So, if you're looking for a gift for a zombie-lover, this is one that should please. But you might want to figure out how to find out whether there's too much overlap. And a good deal for a quick gift.
summary: Recipient, a zombie fan, enjoyed these

reviewText: These movies are very low budget movies however I love zombie movies so I added these to my collection. I won't be watching these over and over but I am collecting all the zombie movies I can find. Yep I really do love zombie movies.

reviewText: This isn't really a review. I just feel that Amazon doesn't give enough information about this DVD collection. I'm adding this so any potential buyer might to be able to make an informed purchasing decision. I hope it's useful.Night of the Living Dead (1968) - 96 min - Horror / Sci-Fi - Director: George A. Romero - Stars: Duane Jones, Judith O'Dea and Karl Hardman.Teenage Zombies a.k.a. Teenage Torture (1959) - 73 min - Horror / Sci-Fi - Director: Jerry Warren - Stars: Don Sullivan, Katherine Victor and Steve Conte.King of the Zombies (1941) 67 min - Comedy / Horror - Director: Jean Yarbrough - Stars: Dick Purcell, Joan Woodbury and Mantan Moreland.White Zombie (1932) - 69 min - Horror - Director: Victor Halperin - Stars: Bela Lugosi, Madge Bellamy and Joseph Cawthorn.Last of the Living (2009) - 88 min - Comedy / Horror - Director: Logan McMillan - Stars: Morgan Williams, Robert Faith and Ashleigh Southam.Grave Mistake (Video 2008) - 90 min - Horror - Director: Shawn Darling - Stars: Seth Darling, Wendy Andrews and James Blackburn.I Am Omega (Video 2007) - 91 min - Action / Horror / Sci-Fi - Director: Griff Furst - Stars: Mark Dacascos, Geoff Meed and Jennifer Lee Wiggins.Awaken the Dead (2007) - 102 min - Action / Horror / Mystery - Director: Jeff Brookshire - Stars: Gary Kohn, Lindsey Morris and Nate Witty.Zombie Dearest (2009) - 85 min - Comedy / Horror - Director: David Kemker - Stars: David Kemker, Shauna Black and David Sparrow.Hide and Creep (2004) - 85 min - Comedy / Horror - Directors: Chuck Hartsell and Chance Shirley - Stars: Chuck Hartsell, Michael Shelton and Kyle Holman.Echo Bridge Home Entertainment, the company that produces this DVD, gives the following synopses for each film. I take no credit for writing them. I've just included them as a courtesy.NIGHT OF THE LIVING DEADIn this George A. Romero classic, a brother and sister visit the gravesite of their deceased father...but when darkness falls, zombies attack.TEENAGE ZOMBIESFour teens go out for an afternoon of waterskiing and wind up locked in cages as the test subjects of a formula meant to turn them into mindless zombies.KING OF THE ZOMBIESDuring WWII, a special agent, his butler, and their pilot crash-land on a remote island swarming with zombies.WHITE ZOMBIEA plantation owner invites a young couple to get married on his estate, plotting to kill the bride-to-be and then bring her back to life as his eternal love slave.LAST OF THE LIVINGThree slackers must step up to the plate to save the human race from flesh-eating zombies.GRAVE MISTAKEA mutant breed of flesh-eating zombies descends on a village and a group of survivors must battle their way to safety.I AM OMEGAThe lone survivor of a deadly plague is doomed to an eternal battle with the mutant creatures that now control the Earth.AWAKEN THE DEADAn assassin's daughter and a down-and-out priest battle the undead as their pasts bind them together in a web of conspiracy and death.ZOMBIE DEARESTWhile digging up the septic tank, Gus unearths an obedient, hard-working zombie...a zombie that will do whatever he wants.HIDE AND CREEPZombies rise from the dead in a small Alabama town and take on a ragtag team of locals.
